original_text: I will take the kingdom away from Solomon because he and his people have turned away from me. They have started to worship Ashtoreth, the female god of the Sidonian people. They also worship Chemosh, the god of the Moabite people, and Molech, the god of the Ammonite people. They have not lived in a way that pleases me. They have not done the things that I say are right. They have not obeyed my rules and my laws. They have not lived in a good way, as Solomon's father David did.
korean_text: 이는 그들이 나를 버리고 시돈 사람의 여신 아스다롯과 모압의 신 그모스와 암몬 자손의 신 밀곰을 경배하며 그의 아버지 다윗이 행함 같지 아니하여 내 길로 행하지 아니하며 나 보기에 정직한 일과 내 법도와 내 율례를 행하지 아니함이니라

sentences.original_text: I will take the kingdom away from Solomon
because he and his people have turned away from me
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그와 그의 백성이 나에게서 떠났기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: They have started to worship Ashtoreth
the female god of the Sidonian people
the god of the Moabite people
and Molech, the god of the Ammonite people
They have not lived in a way that pleases me
They have not done the things that I say are right
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내가 옳다고 말하는 일들을 하지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They have not obeyed my rules and my laws
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 내 규칙과 법을 지키지 않았다

sentences.original_text: They have not lived in a good way
